Articles.Content:
I have never tried this before, and before I do, I want to ask the community.

Can you install a 0.90 mod, and make it work in 0.25? Basically can a mod updated to 0.90, still work in 0.25??

Well, it depends. I believe if it includes probe cores, probably not, simply because they overhauled how probes work in .90. Some things will probably work, but not everything. Don't take my word exactly, because I don't know for sure. I'm just a fellow KSP player, nothing more, nothing less. ^-^

Does a CD work in a VCR player?

It's entirely possible that a mod .90-ready might work in .25, but I wouldn't count on it.

Pure part mods have a so-so chance of working.

Plugin mods are unlikely to ,and if they are active in the editor almost certainly not as the editor underwent massive changes in the 0.90 update.

D.
Thanks for the info guys! I'll try it out and see what happens.
